name: Mouzes vs The Ram King
description:
Mouzes vs The Ram King - The fight for the title is a short game where you need to make your way to the last boss to get the title of the best adventurer. 

Who will win?

Mouzes, who is the fastest old man in the world...

Or...

The Ram King, who has more defense and hits his enemy with a lot of damage...

The choice is up to you.
